name: ATL - Black - Torpedo
additionalNotes: ATL Black comes with a Mexican San Andres wrapper, the ATL Black packs a punch but avoids the bitterness that often characterizes other full-bodied cigars. The secret is a combination of “fuerte” and “suave” featuring high-end ASP leaf in a blend that is one of a kind. Produced in partnership with Luciano Meirelles at Ace Prime – Tabacalera Pichardo in Esteli, this is a Maduro. Flavours Chocolate, Earth, Espresso and Leather.
